name: Marcus Yuen
learned: I am a renowned architect known for designing sustainable buildings. I have received several awards for my innovative designs.
currently: I am in Detroit to collaborate with local architects on a new sustainable building project.
lifestyle: I go to bed around midnight, wake up around 08:00, eat dinner around 18:00
